snippet.title: 13Z Global Playtest 2 Co-op Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
🔥 13Z Playtest 2 with Co-op is LIVE! 🔥 Join now: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2348250/13Z_The_Zodiac_Trials/. The much-awaited 4-player co-op is finally here, along with a new playable character, expanded elemental upgrades, and more! Team up, experiment with powerful synergies, and test your skills in the Zodiac Trials. 

**What’s New in Playtest 2?**
✅ 4-Player Co-op – Join forces with friends and strategize your runs!
🦅 New Character: Sylith the Raven – Master his dagger throws & aerial attacks.
⚔️ New Martial Arts Style for Lyra – Unlock her Phantom Dancer techniques!
🌟 Expanded Elemental System – More elements, more upgrades, and new synergies!
🎨 Visual & Performance Upgrades – Sharper graphics, better physics, and improved combat flow.

🔗 Read the full update here: https://store.steampowered.com/news/app/2348250/view/523084408406671422

📌 Wishlist 13Z on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2348250/13Z_The_Zodiac_Trials/

*We'd love to hear from you!*
💟 Discord: https://discord.gg/eH7RqCVfHu
🐦 Twitter: https://twitter.com/13z_game
👾 Tiktok: https://tiktok.com/@13z.game

🔔 Subscribe for more updates & gameplay footage! Don’t miss out on upcoming features as we continue building 13Z: The Zodiac Trials.

#13Z #CoopGameplay #Roguelike #ActionGame #SteamGames #indiegame #gamedev #gamedevelopment 
---
Hack and Slash, Roguelike, Action, Action Adventure, Coop action game, action roguelike, Steam playtest
